name: pocketed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
pocket
to put something into your pocket: He carefully pocketed his change.
to hit a billiard or snooker ball into a pocket: Davis pocketed the black to win the game.
to take something for yourself, especially dishonestly: I'll tell them I sold it for £20, not £25, then I can pocket the rest.
